HOMEPAGE_DESCRIPTION: How taxes are used to finance stadiums profesionnal soccer clubs in Europe.
HOMEPAGE_ADDR_DESCRIPTION: Discover how taxes are spend in footbal clubs and stadiums around you.
HOMEPAGE_CLUBS_DESCRIPTION: Discover the subventions received from public instituations.
HOMEPAGE_FINDINGS_CONTENT: Sykes aruzan keshiri klatooinian hoth. Tatooine organa monkey-lizard keshiri darth. Rebo vor xexto altyr calamari moddell lorth. Shawda gora kohl palpatine depa droopy falleen kowakian. Zam bothan letaki tapani ooryl drall draethos windu. Senex bardan choka mara var binks lobot lahara. Vebb tano baba nagai jacen md-5 organa. Mas mothma fode vuffi altyr snootles obi-wan chagrian. Coway mon nar nal falleen dexter bertroff quinlan. Jabiimas bespin timoliini iridonian owen dulok shmi rune. Yoda organa qui-gonn whill momaw kir mon ishi.
ABOUT_CONTENT: Sykes aruzan keshiri klatooinian hoth. Tatooine organa monkey-lizard keshiri darth. Rebo vor xexto altyr calamari moddell lorth. Shawda gora kohl palpatine depa droopy falleen kowakian. Zam bothan letaki tapani ooryl drall draethos windu. Senex bardan choka mara var binks lobot lahara. Vebb tano baba nagai jacen md-5 organa. Mas mothma fode vuffi altyr snootles obi-wan chagrian. Coway mon nar nal falleen dexter bertroff quinlan. Jabiimas bespin timoliini iridonian owen dulok shmi rune. Yoda organa qui-gonn whill momaw kir mon ishi.

for the club {club}
SEE_MONEY_TRANSFERS_FOR_CLUB: See money transfers in this club
INTRO_TERRITORY: For the period 2003-2015, The Football Tax investigators traced {total_amount} of public money spent by {territory} dedicated to football (clubs and/or stadiums). Find below the details and visualize how these expenses are spread over years and beneficiaries.
YEAR_MOST_SPENDING_INTRO: Our investigation team traced that in {year}, {territory} provided:
YEAR_MOST_SPENDING_OUTRO: In total, {territory} spent at least {total_amount_year} of public money to support professional football this year.
LARGEST_BENEFICIARY:
The largest beneficiary from {territory}: {beneficiary}
for the club {club}
LARGEST_BENEFICIARY_DESC: For the period 2003-2015, we traced that {territory} provided {beneficiary} with {amount_largest_beneficiary} (for the club {club}), which makes it the largest beneficiary of {territory}
SPENDING_TERR_FOR_CLUB:
{territory} provided around {amount} to {club} between 2003 and 2015. The largest payment occured in {year_largest_payment}, it corresponds to a {type_payment}.
